comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: >> Z.A. M. in a Wall St. broker's office This is "2 AM in a Wall St. broker's office" -- taken on October 23, 1915, 2:00 AM. See: this photo at The Library of Congress; "Wall St., N.Y., 2 A.M. in broker's office: Clerks sleeping in office due to excessive work caused by heavy stock business."
